contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{nihongo|'''Mitsugi'''|御調郡|Mitsugi-gun}} was a [[districts of Japan|district]] located in [[Hiroshima Prefecture]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the district had an estimated [[population]] of 29,682 and a [[population density|density]] of 181.49 persons per km². The total area was 163.55 km². ==Former towns and villages== * [[Kui, Hiroshima|Kui]] * [[Mitsugi, Hiroshima|Mitsugi]] * [[Mukaishima, Hiroshima|Mukaishima]] ===Mergers=== * On March 22, 2005 the town of [[Kui, Hiroshima|Kui]] merged (with two towns from other districts) with the old city of [[Mihara, Hiroshima|Mihara]] to create the new city of [[Mihara, Hiroshima|Mihara]]. * On March 28, 2005, the towns of [[Mitsugi, Hiroshima|Mitsugi]] and [[Mukaishima, Hiroshima|Mukaishima]] merged into the expanded city of [[Onomichi, Hiroshima|Onomichi]]. Mitsugi District was dissolved as a result. {{coord missing|Hiroshima Prefecture}} [[Category:Former districts of Hiroshima Prefecture]] {{Hiroshima-geo-stub}}
